oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-09-22 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 22, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Carl Perkins, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Del Wood, June Carter, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Jordanaires; Carl Perkins; Del Wood; June Carter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- Turn Her Down (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces the Jordanaires -- Fighting For The Lord (Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Carl Perkins -- I'm Sorry, I'm Not Sorry (Carl Perkins) -- Faron Young talks -- Fire On The Mountain -- Faron Young talks -- Where Could I Go But To The Lord (Faron Young, Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Faron Young introduces Del Wood -- Intermission At The Opry (Del Wood) -- Faron Young introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Faron Young) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jordanaires (Musical group); Young, Faron; Perkins, Carl, 1932-1998
